translations.translation: But he could not scale the steep ascent.
But he did not venture to scale the difficult steep.
Yet, he has not entered into Aqaba
So he did not quickly enter the steep valley.
But he has not attempted to pass on the path that is steep.
But he would not attempt the uphill road,
Yet he has not assaulted the steep;
But he hath not attempted the Ascent -
But he has not attempted the ascent.
Yet he attempteth not the steep,
Yet he has not embarked upon the uphill task.
But he hath made no haste on the path that is steep.
But he has made no effort to pass on the path that is steep.
Yet he has not scaled the height.
But he did not brave the ascent.
But he has not broken through the difficult pass.
[90:11] Yet why does he not assault the obstacle?, [why] does he [not] surmount it?
(But he hath not attempted the Ascent) He says: but did he go beyond that hurdle which is the Bridge over hell?

commentaries.author: زيد بن علي
commentaries.text:
وقوله تعالى: { فَلاَ ٱقتَحَمَ ٱلْعَقَبَةَ } فالاقتحامُ في الشَّيءِ: الدُّخولُ فيهِ
 والعَقبةُ: جَبلٌ وراء جهَنمَ

commentaries.author: الجيلاني
commentaries.text:
وبعدما أعطيناه وهديناه { فَلاَ ٱقتَحَمَ } وما دخل الإنسان { ٱلْعَقَبَةَ } [البلد: 11] أي: الكؤودة الوعرة على نفسه الشاقة لها، حتى يؤدي شكر ما أعطيناه




ثمَّ أبهمها سبحانه تعظيماً وتفخيماً فقال: { وَمَآ أَدْرَاكَ } أيها المغرور بالحياة المستعار ولوازمها { مَا ٱلْعَقَبَةُ } [البلد: 12] الكؤودة في طريق أهل الإيمان والعرفان
